pages.text: Animania is all about enhancing the passive critters you encounter on your journey.$(br2)Not only does it enhance the critters you know and (hopefully) love, it adds many more like goats, peafowl, and even hamsters and hedgehogs!
The Animania Manual contains everything you need to know about the new critters and what they can do for you.$(br2)It can be crafted with a book, any kind of seed, and some straw.
Straw is the favourite sleeping block for most animals.$(br2) $(br2)It is also required to craft the Animania Manual.
The Carving Knife is used to cut up meats and cheeses ... as well as to cut wheat into straw.$(br2)It also has $(o)other$() uses, but you can read more about those in the Animania Manual.
